Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-26466 affecting package openssh for versions less than 9.8p1-3
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-26466 affecting package openssh for versions less than 9.8p1-3. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package openssh is earlier than 9.8p1-3, affected by CVE-2025-26466
